name: Magus Pocus
description: In a fantastic world full of challenges, your goal is to recover the balance gem stolen by a 5th dimensional wizard. The mere presence of this mage in our world interferes with its balance, so elementals begin to emerge and the world scene begins to distort. Under the control of an apprentice mage also from the 5th dimension, you will have to face enemies and deadly traps. Come be part of this adventure without you the chaos will never be contained.
